website_summaries.verdict: A nice option if you're looking for a smaller sink that is dependable.
pros: Smaller size helps to save on space
Easy to install and built to last
cons: Some have complained the sink is too small

customer_reviews.title: Good, but....
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered 10 of these for a project. They look good but once fully installed a major issue comes up. When running water after you turn the water off, there is a strange angle where the drain and the sink come together. Water sits in about a 1/8th' circle around the drain and won't go down. It looks like the drain isn;t working but its the angle of the sink that allows the water to sit.
customer_reviews.author: SSPrimeGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great size and depth
customer_reviews.text: I love these sinks. We did a master bath remodel, replacing the old, chipped moulded sink/countertop unit with quartz and these undermount sinks. It's a perfect size for washing my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Susan in NC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, nice quality sink!
customer_reviews.text: Item fit a pre-cut granite top I bought from someone locally. I got from marketplace at a very good price. I believe the problem was that the lip that attaches to the underside of the vanity top was not quite flat, but that didn't matter. I did buy epoxy clips on Amazon as well, and used the silicone adhesive and it held solid, no issues. A beautiful, high quality name brand sink for a bargain-what's not to love??
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Wow these sinks are small!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone talked about how small the sinks were...Didn't realize exactly how small they were until I got them installed. It's partially an illusion for me as well since I'm coming from a home that had top-mount sinks to this home that has under-mount sinks which can make them seem smaller as well. Regardless of size, they are great quality and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SIZED SINKS
customer_reviews.text: They look great, are functional and are just the right size for my upstairs bath. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Gail D. Spinn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sink
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and was perfect for my bathroom remodel.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy C.

customer_reviews.title: Plumbers Couldn’t Find
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small bisque colored sink, but my plumbers couldn’t find one. I had it in hand the next day and my remodeling project didn’t miss a beat.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a builder and we recently started ordering some of our materials off Amazon. With the Prime expedited shipping and competitive prices, it is so fast and convenient for us and our clients. These sinks came within two days! However, now that they are installed, the "Kohler" name that is etched above the drain is rubbing off (it was installed 3 days ago).This should NEVER happen with Kohler products. The name is stamped on below the porcelain, allowing it to always remain in tact. These sinks had the name printed on after being manufactured. We are very disappointed in the quality control over at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Paul

customer_reviews.title: this one is really perfect for this bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I put a lot of thought into the right sink, this one is really perfect for this bathroom. I have double sink and its definitely not too small and the water does not pool at all like some people complained. I am 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I had 4 of these installed under a new granite vanity tops. They are true Kohler quality with heavy duty support clips. Anyone installing a vanity sink without an overflow is asking for trouble. The overflow on these are sized to handle full flow of my faucets with screens removed.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: When undermounted with a thick backsplash you can't get the ...
customer_reviews.text: When undermounted with a thick backsplash you can't get the faucet to mount close enough to the sink. You must cut out a fairly large amount of ceramic to clear a typical Moen or Delta faucet. A very serious problem. Also, water collects around the drain and will stain if your water has any iron in it. Not having a cut out for the typical faucet is an unforgivable drawback.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Velk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sinks to save space on you vanity top
customer_reviews.text: Great sink, especially for an 18" vanity, although we used the same sinks for our large vanity to free up space which they do nicely. If for some reason you need a big sink, though, these are probably not for you.
customer_reviews.author: D Charles

customer_reviews.title: Sink is nice size and depth.
customer_reviews.text: Sink is nice size and depth, not shallow like some others I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: JHN

customer_reviews.title: Nice small sink
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 7 years ago because I needed a small sink. Looks great, works as expected, it's a sink!
customer_reviews.author: A. Dantry

customer_reviews.title: Great product but it you'll Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Actually after reading some of the postings I almost chose another sink. I'm absolutely 100% happy with it. It is excellent quality and looks wonderful. I am very lucky it was not damaged. The packing was awful. Kohler needs to improve that other wise I'm very happy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Boomer

customer_reviews.title: After we pulled everything together I am happy that I did not select a larger sink as ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this sink for a hallway bathroom. After installation, I thought maybe this is too small. After we pulled everything together I am happy that I did not select a larger sink as we opted for more counter space.
customer_reviews.author: Fullerton, CA

customer_reviews.title: Small bowl for small cabinet
customer_reviews.text: worked in our tiny custom powder room cabinet. Make sure you find a very small faucet to go with it!
customer_reviews.author: thecharcuterer

customer_reviews.title: Kohler skipped quality control
customer_reviews.text: We already have three Kohler 2209 Caxton sinks in our home, and we were ordering two more, these in Biscuit. One of the sinks arrived with two significant indentations in the sink bowl, which had to occur prior to firing in the kiln. Should have been caught before firing. Should have been caught after firing. Should have been caught before boxing. I had to send it back. Sent the other one back as well since it had minor pit blemishes in glaze of sink bowl as well. Wasted my time, wasted somebody's shipping costs. Where is quality control?
customer_reviews.author: +David

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just exactly what we wanted! We ordered 3 of them and every one looks perfect - sparkling white without a single blemish.
customer_reviews.author: DJ James

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these sinks. They arrived on time and in perfect condition. Now all I have to do is get them installed and I will be thrilled.
customer_reviews.author: JeannieBee

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this sink for my new granite counter in my bathroom. The cabinet is small so the top is small (22.5 x 25.5)as well. The size of the sink is nice for the bathroom, and the depth is great, a bit deeper than the previous sink that I had. The sink, along with my new granite counter top looks very elegant. I put a brushed nickel faucet to complete the look and am very pleased with the outcome.
customer_reviews.author: CTshopper

customer_reviews.title: When you want quality.
customer_reviews.text: Our third Kohler sink and three more to go. All I can say is Quality. love them
customer_reviews.author: James W. Sherrill, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect smaller under mount sink
customer_reviews.text: Perfect smaller under mount sink. We bought the larger ones, 14 Inches, and they were too deep front to back for our custom vanity.
customer_reviews.author: Warren H

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sink
customer_reviews.text: I am remodeling my hall bathroom and already had a Kohler Almond toilet so I wanted the sink to match my toilet. Amazon had an excellent price for the Kohler sink. It was packed extremely well and arrived quickly and damage free.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: No installation template
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the sink basin is fine. Was packed very well (Kohler box was inside Amazon foam packing box). Only problem is it did not come with installation template which will make my installation much more difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Fan

customer_reviews.title: Smaller size was perfect
customer_reviews.text: We like this sink and needed a smaller size. We had a small counter op and could not find a small sink in the local Home Depot or Lowes. This worked.
customer_reviews.author: Orange cat

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a master bath
customer_reviews.text: The Kohler quality is there, the sink drains well, and the Amazon price is excellent, but this sink is just too small for a master bath. I traded off additional drawer space for a smaller sink, but everyday, I must wipe up splashes around the "too small" sink. The sink fit the hole and it was only 1 of 2 that would. If you have already selected your cabinetry and are just trying to find a sink that fits the hole, I recommend this sink. Otherwise, I would recommend looking at a different cabinetry layout.
customer_reviews.author: Engineer

customer_reviews.title: They look great in the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: They arrived quickly and were well packaged. They look great in the bathroom...used a simple chrome faucet and it's very minimalist and neat looking.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a smaller oval sink so we could maximize the counter space. This sink came quickly and packaged well with no broken or missing parts. It is nice and deep and although it looks smaller than our previous "early 70's" sink it is really a little bigger overall. Love having an undermount sink...matches our white Kohler toilet. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: kjm

customer_reviews.title: watch out for faucet offsets!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sink, but double check the template to make sure you'll have enough room for your faucet to clear the rim under the countertop!
customer_reviews.author: Maine Train

customer_reviews.title: Great sink for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Another great sink for the price. A classic, like pearls and goes with any decor
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M. Mcdermott

customer_reviews.title: completely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: nice and deep, high quality. I got the 17" ones, and I kind of wish I'd gotten a larger size, but they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: teb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love our bathroom sink! It's exactly what we thought
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These look great in my new bathroom redo. Very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: CLP

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality sink
customer_reviews.text: Great Great love this small bathroom sink, I have more counter space!! Nice quality...
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Superior product.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional replacement for an inferior sink that came with the bathroom cabinet. Shipped with great care.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: We just finished updating our 27 year old bathroom and used this sink. It was the perfect size - not too small and compliments our granite top perfectly. It was easy to install and includes the template for the counter top!
customer_reviews.author: M. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: great sink
customer_reviews.text: I love this sink. I ordered it for our bathroom which has a small countertop. the sink is just the right size and super deep which is great. the depth compensate for the overall size.
customer_reviews.author: cutie

customer_reviews.title: like the Kohler mame
customer_reviews.text: Like the size. Haven't installed yet but feel confident in the Kohler name.
customer_reviews.author: B. Willis

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a sink that I accidentally cracked (normally hard to do!) and this one was considerably more sturdy, with a thicker rim all around. Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Deahnara Regan

customer_reviews.title: perfect size sinks - feel and look high end
customer_reviews.text: used 2 of these for a bathroom remodel. The bathroom was fairly small so we decided to expand it by taking some space from a nearby closet and add a small 2 sink vanity. These sinks were the perfect size and looked gorgeous mounted under a carrara marble slab. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: david v

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and modern
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these sinks when we remodeled our bathroom. They are just the right size; now we have beautiful sinks and much more usable counter space.
customer_reviews.author: karen48230

customer_reviews.title: Caxton Sinks
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Great size if you want two sinks in a relatively small area. Have two and bought exactly the same after home was destroyed by fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sink. Good quality and look. Looks great in my newly remodeled bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Macdj

customer_reviews.title: Breakage PROBLEMS with Kohler
customer_reviews.text: I bought two Kohler K-2209 sinks. They both arrived broken - one in pieces and the other was chipped. Had to pay $13 more each to get locally.
customer_reviews.author: Great BlueGreen Algae

customer_reviews.title: pink sink
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice.. Love the under counter gives much more room on the countertop. so glad we could get a older color..Thanks Kohler!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dot

customer_reviews.title: Top notch sink for smaller bathrooms where you want more counter space.
customer_reviews.text: The smaller size is perfect for a smaller bathroom as it opens up counter space. We put this in our guest bath which has one double door vanity (24"). The width is perfect. The sink is plenty deep, but not too deep. I would recommend this sink for smaller bathroom areas.
customer_reviews.author: bocaabu

customer_reviews.title: Great Sink - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this sink for a new bathroom vanity. It arrived on time and in perfect condition. We love it... and what a great price!
customer_reviews.author: L. Schlezinger

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: no template for countertop! This is abusolutely horrible. Delayed the whole remodeling process.
customer_reviews.author: zw

customer_reviews.title: bought 2 of these
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfactory installation of 2 during bathroom remodel. Contractor thought they would be too small but are really a perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: ffrockport

product_meta.title: KOHLER K-2209-0 Caxton Under-Mount Bathroom Sink, White
product_meta.description:
Color:WhiteInstall this Caxton undercounter lavatory beneath solid-surface countertops to combine the look of an integral basin with the benefits of durable vitreous china. Available in a palette of KOHLER colors, Caxton lavatories complement both traditional and contemporary décor.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Install this Caxton undercounter lavatory beneath solid-surface countertops to combine the look of an integral basin with the benefits of durable vitreous china. Available in a palette of KOHLER colors, Caxton lavatories complement both traditional and contemporary décor.
feature_bullets: DESIGN: Oval basin with unglazed underside for a timeless, easy-to-clean addition to your bath or powder room.
REQUIRES: No faucet or faucet holes; requires wall- or counter-mount faucet.
MATERIAL: Vitreous china for lasting beauty and exceptional durability.
INSTALLATION: Under-mount installation allows this sink to seamlessly integrate into your bath or powder room design.
Bowl Area: Length- 15.25 inch, Width- 12.25 inch
COORDINATION: Coordinates with other products in the Caxton collection.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars123 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
